name: underscores
description: Custom WordPress theme using only essential build tools.
author: Aljoša Renčof

scripts.watch:sass: concurrently "sass --watch sass/main.scss:css/main.css --source-map --style=expanded" "sass --watch sass/main.scss:css/main.min.css --style=compressed && postcss css/main.min.css --use autoprefixer -o css/main.min.css"
scripts.build:sass: sass sass/main.scss css/main.css --source-map --style=expanded && sass sass/main.scss css/main.min.css --no-source-map --style=compressed && postcss css/main.min.css --use autoprefixer -o css/main.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build:sass && npm run minify:js
